snippet: Shaking off a career-high seven sacks, Matt Ryan led a late-game rally to help the Atlanta Falcons defeat the Panthers and remain undefeated.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Atlanta Falcons stay undefeated with a 30-28 victory over the Carolina Panthers; other football scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Shaking off a career-high seven sacks, Matt Ryan led a late-game rally to help the Atlanta Falcons defeat the Panthers and remain undefeated.

headline.print_headline: Backed Up to Goal Line, Ryan Reaches Back for Win
headline.seo: Backed Up to Goal Line, Matt Ryan Reaches Back for Win
headline.main: Backed Up to Goal Line, Ryan Reaches Back for Win
